metadata.name: Another Life by Violetta Zironi #1

attributes.value: I Wasn't Ready, You Couldn't Wait

metadata.description: Another Life is a music NFT/PFP collection by Violetta Zironi: 5 original songs recorded on tape paired with 5200 unique hand drawn PFPs inspired by the music.  The songs are written and produced by Violetta Zironi and Michael Hunter Ochs.  The artworks are hand drawn by Arianna Rea.
